com.sri.ai.grinder.polynomial.core

Class PolynomialIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.polynomial.core.PolynomialIntegration

public class PolynomialIntegration
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for performing indefinite and definite integration on polynomials.

    oreilly

    • Method Detail

      • indefiniteIntegral

        public static Polynomial indefiniteIntegral(Polynomial polynomial,
                                            Expression variable)
        Takes a polynomial:
         t_1 * variable ^ n + ... + t_n * variable + t_{n+1}
        and returns the polynomial equivalent to:
         (t_1/(n + 1)) * variable ^ {n + 1} + ... + (t_n / 2) * variable^2 + t_{n+1}*variable
        Parameters:
        polynomial - the polynomial the indefinite integral is to be found for.
        variable - the variable integration is with respect to.
        Returns:
        the indefinite integral of the given polynomial.

      • definiteIntegral

        public static Polynomial definiteIntegral(Polynomial polynomial,
                                          Expression variable,
                                          Expression start,
                                          Expression end,
                                          com.google.common.base.Predicate<Expression> isVariable)
        This method will return the polynomial equivalent to:
         Q.replace(variable, end) - Q.replace(variable, start)
        where 'Q = indefiniteIntegral(polynomial, variable)'
        Parameters:
        polynomial - the polynomial the definite integral is to be found for.
        variable - the variable integration is with respect to.
        start - the starting limit of the integral.
        end - the ending limit of the integral.
        Returns:
        the definite integral of the polynomial for the given limits.
